channel.title: ShenTirag on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in ShenTirag on ZooBerry

item.title: Roosevelt Elk
item.description: A Roosevelt Elk made by ShenTirag in 2006; originally released on Shen’s Den.

item.title: Afromontane Foliage
item.description: A set of trees from African mountains made to accompany the user-made Montane Forest biome!

item.title: European Pack I
item.description: The first part of our little project, contains the European Mouflon, the Highland Cow and the Shire Horse!

item.title: Exmoor Pony
item.description: The Exmoor Pony is a hardy, sturdy breed of semi-feral pony, one of many of the mountain and moorland ponies of the British Isles.

item.title: Flower Hat Jellyfish
item.description: This striking and rare jelly has brilliant, multicolored tentacles trailing from a translucent, pinstriped bell.

item.title: Highland Cow Moorland Hack
item.description: Moves the highland cow to the Moorland biome.

item.title: Jackson's Mongoose
item.description: Jackson’s mongooses are typically a greyish or dull brownish in color, with the legs being black.

item.title: Montane Forest
item.description: Montane forests are a type of tropical moist forest that exist at higher elevations.

item.title: Moorland
item.description: Moorland is an upland habitat covered in low lying vegetation, such as hardy grasses and thick carpets of heather.

item.title: Red Grouse
item.description: The red grouse is differentiated by its plumage being reddish brown and not having a white winter plumage.

item.title: Arabian Nights Location Banners
item.description: A set of banners with locations featured in Artifex’s Arabian Nights user-made expansion pack.

item.title: Crumbling Dark Brick Pack
item.description: Dark crumbling bricks are a perfect path for Halloween themed areas of your zoos. Original skin by genkicoll for ZT1, converted to ZT2 by ShenTirag.

item.title: Extinct Animal Crossing Signs
item.description: A set of nine extinct animal crossing signs that warn visitors on foot or in jeep transports that various extinct animals from around the world may cross their path.

item.title: Genkicoll's ZT1 Paths for ZT2 Pack
item.description: A selection of genkicoll’s wonderful paths that she has made for ZT1, replicated with permission for use in ZT2. Enjoy wooden, sandstone, shadowstone and other paths in your zoos!

item.title: Island Excursions Location Banners
item.description: A set of banners with locations featured in Artifex’s Arabian Nights user-made expansion pack.

item.title: Leafy Path
item.description: A path covered in newly fallen leaves, featuring leaf decorations along the curb as well. Perfect for a walk through temperate forests!

item.title: Natural Scenery Pack 1
item.description: The first of two sets aimed towards creating more realistic zoos, and my first ever user-made pack for Zoo Tycoon 2! Featuring three paths (two bark chip and one stone path), two topiaries and a bench.

item.title: Natural Scenery Pack 2
item.description: A second set of natural wooden scenery to soften the curves of a harsh city zoo. Featuring a mahogany wooden donation box, binocular set, viewing canopy and map, alongside a set of ivy covered arches including large sizes to cover wide paths. Additionally, several fallen logs are contained to give a realistic feel to a forest exhibit.

item.title: Rusty Fences
item.description: A pair of rusting metal fences, complete with chains and portholes! Perfect for placing alongside benthic animals!

item.title: Warning Signs
item.description: This small pack contains signs containing warnings and instructions to abide when visiting the zoo. It includes No Entry and Staff Only, signs reminding guests to not tap the glass or feed the animals, prohibiting flash photography, reminding guests to wash their hands and other useful signs for zoos and safari parks.

item.title: Realistic MM2 Biomes Hack
item.description: This hack adds more realistic foliage and rock details to the Marine Mania biomes (Benthic, Coastal, Pelagic and Reef).

item.title: ZT2DC Gazebo
item.description: This download was created as a collaboration between many members for the first Skinning Collage Event at ZT2DC.

item.title: Red Fox
item.description: The most widespread carnivore in the world is ready for your zoos!

item.title: European Badger
item.description: European Badger skinned and coded by ShenTirag, with the model created by SilesianTomcat.

item.title: Animal Crossing Signs
item.description: A set of sixteen animal crossing signs that warn visitors on foot or in jeep transports that various animals from around the world may cross their path.

item.title: Topiary Pack
item.description: This pack contains topiary versions of the lion, tiger and elephant fountains, as well as a matching low shrub hedge.

item.title: Elephant Bird Variants
item.description: A bundle of beautiful elephant bird variants made by ShenTirag!

item.title: Protarchaeopteryx Variants
item.description: A bundle of beautiful protarchaeopteryx variants made by ShenTirag!

item.title: Auroch Variants
item.description: Auroch variants made by ShenTirag.

item.title: Shen's Path Pack
item.description: A pack with 12 new paths!

item.title: Shen's Fences Pack
item.description: 10 new fences!

item.title: Sandstone Theme
item.description: The Sandstone Theme Pack contains items made of softly coloured sandstone, often overgrown with ivy.

item.title: EA Foliage Expansion Pack
item.description: An EA foliage expansion pack by ShenTirag.

item.title: Coastal Theme Pack
item.description: A coastal theme pack by ShenTirag.

item.title: Waterfall Fountain
item.description: A soothing waterfall perfect for wetlands or tropical rainforest areas in your zoos.

item.title: Biome Shelter Pack
item.description: Enjoy this trio of shelters made by ShenTirag!
